name: GO-4-Soldier-1
description:
GO-4-Soldier-1 is a turn-based puzzle-adventure set in the African bush. Fight your way through ten beautifully handcrafted levels.

You will face deadly challenges, not only from man but nature.
* Navigate using simple directional buttons.
* Experience 3D visuals and captivating African bush sounds.
* Fight dangerous rebels and avoid deadly African animals.
* Use mutually supported gameplay to solve complex puzzles.
* Collect enemy intel and weapons caches.

ARMSCor Studios brings you the first instalment of our future RTS platform roadmap.
